content.content: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our health and productivity content website.
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you subscribe to our newsletter, download our meal plans or workout guides, or contact us for health and productivity advice.

items: Personal Information: Name, email address for newsletter and resource access
Health Goals: General fitness and wellness goals you share with us
Content Preferences: Types of health and productivity content you're interested in
Usage Data: How you interact with our health and fitness content

content.content: We use the information we collect to:

items: Provide health, fitness, and productivity content and resources
Send you relevant tips, meal plans, and workout guides
Communicate about new content and health-related updates
Improve our content based on user interests and needs
Ensure the safety and security of our health content platform

content.content: We do not collect sensitive health data or medical information. Our content is for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at yousraelassoui6@gmail.com
